definitions.definition: The faculty of thinking, judging, abstract reasoning, and conceptual understanding; the cognitive faculty (uncountable)
definitions.example: Intellect is one of man's greatest powers.

definitions.definition: The capacity of that faculty (in a particular person) (uncountable)
definitions.example: They were chosen because of their outstanding intellect.

definitions.definition: A person who has that faculty to a great degree
definitions.example: Some of the world's leading intellects were meeting there.
